beetlink.linkPrompt: Proceed with linking this app to your Beet wallet below.
beetlink.beetWait: Waiting on response from BEET prompt

connect.previousBEET: Which previously linked BEET account do you want to use?
connect.newBEET: Want to use a different account?
connect.beetHeader: This tool is designed for use with the Bitshares BEET Wallet.
connect.beetSubheading: Launch and unlock it, then click the connect button below to proceed.
connect.btsPrompt: Don't yet have the Bitshares BEET wallet installed? Follow the link below.
connect.btsGuide: Once installed, create a wallet and proceed to connect above.
